title: SEC’s OCIE Issues a Second Cybersecurity Risk Alert
text:

On Sept. 15, 2015, the Securities Exchange Commission (SEC) Office of Compliance Inspections and Examinations (OCIE) published its second cybersecurity risk alert (the “2015 Risk Alert”). The 2015 Risk Alert is a follow up to the OCIE’s April 2014 cybersecurity initiative risk alert (the “2014 Risk Alert” 

The 2014 Risk Alert provided a broad list of documents that OCIE may request for its cybersecurity examinations. Much of the 2014 Risk Alert tracked information from the Framework for Improving Critical Infrastructure Cybersecurity released on Feb. 12, 2014, by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (the “NIST Framework”
